content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":50143,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d9006353-4f48-442b-bd41-9db0902b7260/8_eng.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d9006353-4f48-442b-bd41-9db0902b7260/8_eng.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"8_eng.png\",\"name\":\"8_eng.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d9006353-4f48-442b-bd41-9db0902b7260\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":246.17224880382776},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A chance to participate in non-project activities is a clear sign that you are considered a strong, responsible, and trusted professional. Our contributors do not stay unrecognized. We are always happy to express our gratitude, and additional bonuses are available for the contributors who participate in non-project activities regularly. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We use special badges to track involvement in different activities. These badges are added up at the end of the year and affect the annual bonus, among other things. We also have JSCC \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCJSCC/Board+of+Heroes+2021\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Boards of Heroes\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" that showcase our team members and may include your picture in the future.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
